userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Public profile information for a registered user.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was created.

customClaims.description: Custom claims for the user, e.g., admin status.

societyMeta.title: Society Metadata
societyMeta.description: A singleton document containing metadata about the entire student society.

name.description: The official name of the student society.

altNames.description: Alternative or past names for the society.

aim.description: The primary mission statement or aim of the society.

eventCycle.description: The annual event cycle or academic year schedule.

genres.description: An array of genres associated with the club.

volunteersCount.description: The total number of volunteers in the club.

coreVolunteers.description: An array of volunteer names for the core team.

membersCount.description: The total number of members in the club.

requirements.description: Map of requirements for the club.

budget.description: Map of budget details for the club.

sequenceFirstProgram.description: Sequence of events for the first program.

name.description: The full name of the volunteer.

para.description: A short paragraph or bio about the volunteer.

roles.description: Roles the volunteer holds within various clubs.

clubs.description: An array of club document references the volunteer is part of.

photoUrl.description: URL of the volunteer's profile picture.

member.title: Member
member.description: Represents a general member of a club.

name.description: The full name of the member.

para.description: A short paragraph or bio about the member.

clubs.description: An array of club IDs the member has joined.

clubId.description: The ID of the club organizing the event.

date.description: The date and time of the event.

venue.description: The location where the event will take place.

description.description: A detailed description of the event.

budget.description: The estimated or final budget for the event.

status.description: The current status of the event.

photos.description: An array of URLs for photos from the event.

galleryItem.title: Gallery Item
galleryItem.description: Represents a media item in the gallery.

caption.description: The title or caption for the media item.

uploadedBy.description: ID of the user who uploaded the item.

date.description: The timestamp when the media was captured or uploaded.

fundTransaction.title: Fund Transaction
fundTransaction.description: Represents a financial transaction for accounting.

source.description: The source of the funds (e.g., club name, sponsor).

signatories.description: IDs of users who authorized the transaction.

philanthropyActivity.title: Philanthropy Activity
philanthropyActivity.description: Represents a philanthropic event or activity.

type.description: The type of activity (e.g., Blood Donation, Charity Drive).

photos.description: Links to photos from the activity.

/clubs/{clubId}.description: Stores information about individual student clubs.

/gallery/{photoId}.description: Collection of all media items for the main gallery.
